title: (x) Desert Living Magazine - Univers & H&FJ Knockout {Lex}
content:
I met with someone from this publication recently, and I “may” work there. Just doing some research, and I have these 7 samples here. I have a feeling that a few are duplicates, just different weights/styles. I am not so keen as to be able to identify as most of you can, so, why not take advantage of this generous service. I have uploaded each one as a different file, so I would appreciate it if you include the number of the sample you are identifying in your response. Thanks much.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154155/http:/typophile.com/files/1_8.gif) | 58.33 KB |
| [2.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154155/http:/typophile.com/files/2_11.gif) | 34.37 KB |
| [3.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154155/http:/typophile.com/files/3_1.gif) | 92.07 KB |

author: track and kern

comments.content:
Some of the numbers might be wrong, but it’s definitely all Univers and Knockout.

1. [Univers 55](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154155/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.108137.0.3&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=WRITER+ERIK&sampleSize=48) (could be 45)  
2. [Knockout 29](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154155/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/knockout/testdriver/ko29.html).  
3. [Univers 65](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154155/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.108137.0.5&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=MYTH%3A&sampleSize=48) and [Univers 45](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154155/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.108137.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=all-in-one+abdominal&sampleSize=48).  
4. [Knockout 30](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154155/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/knockout/testdriver/ko30.html).  
5. [Univers 45](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154155/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.108137.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=EXCERCISE+YOUR+RIGHT&sampleSize=48) and [Univers 55](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154155/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.108137.0.3&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=THE+TRUTH&sampleSize=48).  
6. [Knockout 30](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154155/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/knockout/testdriver/ko30.html).  
7. [Knockout 46](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154155/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/knockout/testdriver/ko46.html).

- Lex
